parameters.name: acceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language of the solution. Valid values: zh-CN and en-US. Not all of the solutions are available in English. If you set this parameter to en-US, but the corresponding solution is actually not available in English, no response is returned.

parameters.name: errorCode
parameters.description: The error code based on which you want to query a solution.

parameters.name: errorMessage
parameters.description: The error message for which you want to query a solution. This parameter must be configured together with the errorCode parameter.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description:
The product code. You can use one of the following methods to query a product code:

- Call the GetRequestLog operation to query a product code from the response.

- Query the code of a product in the OpenAPI Explorer URL of the product. For example, the OpenAPI Explorer URL of Short Message Service (SMS) is https\://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. Therefore, the product code of SMS is Dysmsapi.
